Issues.Title: Multiclassification - LightGBM and FastTree not working as expected with infere column
Issues.Body:
**System Information (please complete the following information):**
 -Windows 11 
 - Auto.ML: 0.20.0
 - .NET Version: 6.0

**Describe the bug**
I'm ecountering multiple issues when trying to use AutoML with the "Multiclassexperiment" with both .net 6 and .net 7. 
I'm thinking it might not be such a good idea to post all at once in case it's an error on my part so I will follow up with further information regarding the other issues in case it's needed.
**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Load columns through column inference using the ColumnInformation class with categorical columns. 
2. Specify FastTree or LightGBM as trainer for an multiclassification experiment.
3. The Exception occurs (see posted images below). I have tried using _mlContext.Data.LoadFromTextFile<T>() with load column attributes, but the same exception occurs. 

**Expected behavior**
By using the InfersColumn function, one should expec all the dependencies to be loaded. I have encountered problems with "model not found.. *Some ONXX DLL* as well when trying to use the preview version,

**Further Information**
I'm getting an expecting Key<int32> exception after doing both trying onehoteconding on the categorical variable, as well as mapvaluetokey function.

All of this might be incoherent, but please state further question and I will specify it more clearly.

![GitHubIssue](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51839999/205415208-2635bbe0-40ee-4081-b21f-18f7e88d05ce.png)

![Githubissue2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51839999/205415213-2061010d-4d4e-4080-8096-71e5c877dc7e.png)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Multiclassification - LightGBM and FastTree not working as expected with infere column" (#6517)

Issues.Title: Add SQL Support to InferColumns
Issues.Body:
Currently InferColumns only supports file data sources. 

Add SQL support to `InferColumns` so it can be used with DatabaseLoader.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Add SQL Support to InferColumns" (#6515)
